RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Digestion resistance
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how resistant pawns are to all forms of chemical digestion: nourishing digestion, conversion into another material, assimilation, and any others.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Acid-proof
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is very difficult to digest. Not impossible, but it’ll take a while; about four times as long as most prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Acid-resistant
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] resists digestion well, and will last about twice as long as most prey in a hostile belly.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Normal acid resistance
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is digested as easily as anyone else.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Melty
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] melts under acid easily and won’t last more than half as long in a hostile belly as most prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Cotton candy
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] falls apart in stomach acid like cotton candy, and doesn’t fare any better in other organs. They have maybe a quarter of the time to escape as normal prey.
